name: root
author: HomecareHomebase
description: A plugin to use the Bake IaC deployment system for Azure

scripts.prod:init: npm run prod:base:init && npm run prod:tasks:init
scripts.initdev:npm: npm run initdev:npm:base & npm run initdev:npm:tasks
scripts.build:lint: npm run build && npm run lint:tasks
scripts.package: npm run tfx:install && npm run package:tasks
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run dev:init && npm run build:lint
scripts.clean:build:test: npm run clean && npm run dev:init && npm run build:lint && npm run test
scripts.prod:clean:build: npm run clean && npm run prod:init && npm run build
scripts.prod:build:package: npm run prod:clean:build && npm run tfx:install && npm run package:tasks
scripts.prod:package:upload: gulp bump-version && npm run prod:clean:build && npm run tfx:install && tfx extension publish --root . --share-with hchb --token ${VSMARKETPLACETOKEN}  --root . --output-path dist --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --rev-version
scripts.prod:full: npm run clean:build:test && npm run sonarqube && npm run prod:package:upload
scripts.tfx:install: npm remove tfx-cli && npm install --global tfx-cli
